name: QuoVadis: Iberukatsu Seneki
overview: QuoVadis: Iberukatsu Seneki is a remake of QuoVadis featuring a reworked and rebalanced battle system and a revised story. Battle maps are now viewed from a top-down perspective, and the system has been completely redesigned to use a new card-draw system to determine the order of unit actions. Unit stats have also been revised to make the game significantly more difficult than the original release.
